categories-0.3: Category LibraryContentsIndex
Control.Category.Comonad
Portabilitynon-portable (class-associated types)
Stabilityexperimental
MaintainerEdward Kmett <ekmett@gmail.com>
Description
Defines Comonad in a way that allows it to represent a Comonad over a Category other than just Hask.
Synopsis
class Copointed w k => Comonad w k where
extend :: k (w a) b -> k (w a) (w b)
duplicate :: k (w a) (w (w a))
mapComonad :: Comonad w k => k a b -> k (w a) (w b)
Documentation
class Copointed w k => Comonad w k where

Instances of Comonad should satisfy the following laws: 

 extract . extend k = k
 extend extract = id
 map f = extend (f . extract)
Methods
extend :: k (w a) b -> k (w a) (w b)
duplicate :: k (w a) (w (w a))
Instances
Comonad Identity (->)
Monad m k => Comonad m (Dual k)
mapComonad :: Comonad w k => k a b -> k (w a) (w b)
free definition of Functor for a Comonad m over a Category k
